entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:37 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 37.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
